subtitleNullable: Large-Scale Open-Source Corpus of Media Dialog
descriptionNullable:
## Context

This dataset consists of 140K+ NPR radio transcripts (from npr.org) covering 20 years of NPR programs, comprising the transcriptions of 10K+ hours of audio. It is introduced and used in the following papers (please cite them if you use this dataset!):

> **Interview: Large-scale Modeling of Media Dialog with Discourse Patterns and Knowledge Grounding**
> Bodhisattwa Prasad Majumder\*, Shuyang Li\*, Jianmo Ni, Julian McAuley
> EMNLP, 2020
>
>
> **Interview: A Large-Scale Open-Source Corpus of Media Dialog**
> Bodhisattwa Prasad Majumder\*, Shuyang Li\*, Jianmo Ni, Julian McAuley
> CoRR, 2020
> https://arxiv.org/pdf/2004.03090.pdf


## Content

This dataset contains both the two-speaker subset (~20K conversations/episodes) and full dataset (~140K conversations/episodes). Individual file formats are described in their "About this file" section.

General terminology:
- Episodes consist of 1+ "turns" of dialog
- Consecutive turns may be from the same or different speakers
- Turns of dialog consist of 1+ "utterances" (or sentences)

## Clarification

For clarification, send an email to me via Kaggle.
